name: Sonic's Game Jam (UNFINISHED)
description:
(READ THIS)

This is a very unfinished version of what would've been a game for the  MFGG Fangame Jam, but didn't get finished due to our programmer getting hindered by unforeseen events. We will still be finishing this game soon, but the current draft of this game is very unfinished and basically unplayable so proceed with awareness.

Thanks for reading, and we hope you understand our difficulties! Stay tuned for the game to officially come out!
